text.more:
This is a network of named entities found in 3,005 unique articles in Dutch media between March 2011 and June 2021. 

The weight of a link between two entities (here given by edge thickness) is given by the number of their co-occurrences within sentences.

The network is divided into clusters as signified by color.

You can find out the following information on nodes by clicking on them: Average sentiment, dominant topic and topic loadings, number of mentions by source, as well as all links.

text.title: RLI Nuclear Energy Named Entity Network
